Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
GenAI provided an opportunity to ask numerous follow up questions. Teachers are constrained to time resources.
The feedback from my teachers is often focused around answering the questions, (although a good teacher will link it back to real-world uses)
However, as it lacks the accute context of my university degree and assessment, GenAI tends to give feedback encompasing a broader scope.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI generally is less harsh, which isnt always helpful. Teachers are stricter in their markings and responses, demaning high quality work for the high quality teaching standards.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI often lacks the standards required to demand high quality work, and will accept mediocre work. This is not a good thing.
